parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: One or more related entities (comma separated).

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: One or more related entities (comma separated).

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Column you want to sort on and the sort direction (comma separated). Example: id,desc

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number and page size (comma separated). NB: You cannot use "page" without "order"! Example: 1,10

parameters.name: transform
parameters.description: Transform the records to object format. NB: This can also be done client-side in JavaScript!

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: The table columns you want to retrieve (comma separated). Example: posts.*,categories.name

parameters.name: filter[]
parameters.description: Filters to be applied. Each filter consists of a column, an operator and a value (comma separated). Example: id,eq,1

parameters.name: satisfy
parameters.description: Should all filters match (default)? Or any?

parameters.description: Item to create.
